Text:

Haha you can mount the image.

Great download, easy to install. I keep getting "This is not a Genuine copy of Microsoft" tool bar when I open Outlook and Word. is this normal? Anyone know?

Clean install. Works perfectly.
Follow simple instructions.  If you
get errors confirm write speed (4x)
low speed is best.  Use high quality media.
Thanks loader, seeders and working
contributors!   The Driveguy
